text: Oman at the Olympics is a history which includes 8 games in 7 countries and 30+ athletes.SportsReference.com (SR/Olympics), Oman ; retrieved 2012-10-12. Since 1982, Oman has contributed to the growth of the "Olympic Movement".Olympics.org, "Factsheet: The Olympic Movement"; retrieved 2012-10-12. The International Olympic Committee's official abbreviation for Oman is OMA."Abbreviations, National Olympic Committees," 2009 Annual Report, p. 91 [PDF p. 92 of 94]; retrieved 2012-10-12. ==History== Teams from Oman have taken part in the Summer Olympic Games but not the Winter Olympic Games. No Oman athlete has won an Olympic medal. The Oman Olympic Committee was formed and recognized in 1982.Olympic.org, Oman; retrieved 2012-10-12. ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes == References == ==Other websites == * Oman profile at London2012.com Category:Sport in Oman Category:Nations at the Olympics
title: Oman at the Olympics
